EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Reassigment of SunPower Lead(s) - {!Opportunity.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
This email is to inform you that because the Opportunity Stage for the lead below has not been updated to indicate that a contact attempt was made, the lead has been reassigned to another SunPower Dealer.
{!Opportunity.Account}
{!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} will no longer have access to the above lead and is prohibited from making contact with them in future. Please note, {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} will be charged the lead handling fee of $35 for each reassigned lead.
If you have any questions, please call 1-800-SUNPOWER or email us at customersupport@sunpowercorp.com.
Regards,
Myrel SunPower Customer Support Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1800-SUNPOWER ext. 33637
